name: Rocket Polygue
description:
Rocket Polygue🚗⚽

Rocket Polygue is a menu inspired by Rocket League in a LowPoly style. The goal of this game was to reproduce the menu of a known game by taking back its atmosphere to plunge the player in the atmosphere and also to allow the developer to understand the different ways to achieve it. You can play Rocket Polygue and navigate in the main menu and you can also to control a car in the main stadium.

______________________________________________________________________________________

📓 Portfolio: https://dematteismylan4.wixsite.com/mylan/portfolio-collections/my-portfolio/roc...

🎮 Original Game: https://www.rocketleague.com/
